verses.verse: וַיַּ֥עַן <WH6030> answered אִיּ֗וֹב <WH347> Then Job וַיֹּאמַֽר׃ <WH559> and said
עַד־ <WH5704> long אָ֭נָה <WH575> How תּוֹגְי֣וּן <WH3013> How long will ye vex נַפְשִׁ֑י <WH5315> my soul וּֽתְדַכְּאוּנַ֥נִי <WH1792> and break בְמִלִּֽים׃ <WH4405> answer

זֶ֤ה <WH2088> These עֶ֣שֶׂר <WH6235> These ten פְּ֭עָמִים <WH6471> times תַּכְלִימ֑וּנִי <WH3637> have ye reproached לֹֽא־ <WH3808> are not תֵ֝בֹ֗שׁוּ <WH954> me ye are not ashamed תַּהְכְּרוּ־ <WH1970> [that] ye make yourselves strange לִֽי׃
וְאַף־ <WH637> Even אָמְנָ֥ם <WH551> And be it indeed שָׁגִ֑יתִי <WH7686> [that] I have erred אִ֝תִּ֗י <WH854> for תָּלִ֥ין <WH3885> remaineth מְשׁוּגָתִֽי׃ <WH4879> mine error

אִם־ <WH518> If אָ֭מְנָם <WH551> If indeed עָלַ֣י <WH5921> against תַּגְדִּ֑ילוּ <WH1431> ye will magnify וְתוֹכִ֥יחוּ <WH3198> [yourselves] against me and plead עָ֝לַ֗י <WH5921> against חֶרְפָּתִּֽי׃ <WH2781> against me my reproach

דְּֽעוּ־ <WH3045> Know אֵ֭פוֹ <WH645> now כִּי־ <WH3588> that אֱל֣וֹהַּ <WH433> that God עִוְּתָ֑נִי <WH5791> hath overthrown וּ֝מְצוּד֗וֹ <WH4686> me with his net עָלַ֥י <WH5921> and has הִקִּֽיף׃ <WH5362> me and hath compassed

הֵ֤ן <WH2005> Behold אֶצְעַ֣ק <WH6817> Behold I cry out חָ֭מָס <WH2555> of wrong וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> no אֵעָנֶ֑ה <WH6030> but I am not heard אֲ֝שַׁוַּ֗ע <WH7768> I cry aloud וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> there מִשְׁפָּֽט׃ <WH4941> but [there is] no judgment

אָרְחִ֣י <WH734> my way גָ֭דַר <WH1443> He hath fenced up וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> cannot אֶעֱב֑וֹר <WH5674> that I cannot pass וְעַ֥ל <WH5921> on נְ֝תִיבוֹתַ֗י <WH5410> in my paths חֹ֣שֶׁךְ <WH2822> darkness יָשִֽׂים׃ <WH7760> and he hath set
כְּ֭בוֹדִי <WH3519> me of my glory מֵעָלַ֣י <WH5921> and הִפְשִׁ֑יט <WH6584> He hath stripped וַ֝יָּ֗סַר <WH5493> and taken עֲטֶ֣רֶת <WH5850> the crown רֹאשִֽׁי׃ <WH7218> [from] my head

יִתְּצֵ֣נִי <WH5422> He hath destroyed סָ֭בִיב <WH5439> me on every side וָאֵלַ֑ךְ <WH1980> am gone וַיַּסַּ֥ע <WH5265> hath he removed כָּ֝עֵ֗ץ <WH6086> like a tree תִּקְוָתִֽי׃ <WH8615> and mine hope

וַיַּ֣חַר <WH2734> He hath also kindled עָלַ֣י <WH5921> against אַפּ֑וֹ <WH639> his wrath וַיַּחְשְׁבֵ֖נִי <WH2803> against me and he counteth ל֣וֹ כְצָרָֽיו׃ <WH6862> me unto him as [one of] his enemies

יַ֤חַד ׀ <WH3162> together יָ֘בֹ֤אוּ <WH935> come גְדוּדָ֗יו <WH1416> His troops וַיָּסֹ֣לּוּ <WH5549> and raise up עָלַ֣י <WH5921> against דַּרְכָּ֑ם <WH1870> their way וַיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> against me and encamp סָבִ֣יב <WH5439> round about לְאָהֳלִֽי׃ <WH168> my tabernacle

אַ֭חַי <WH251> my brethren מֵעָלַ֣י <WH5921> and הִרְחִ֑יק <WH7368> far וְ֝יֹדְעַ֗י <WH3045> from me and mine acquaintance אַךְ־ <WH389> are completely זָ֥רוּ <WH2114> are verily estranged מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <WH4480> at
חָדְל֥וּ <WH2308> have failed קְרוֹבָ֑י <WH7138> My kinsfolk וּֽמְיֻדָּעַ֥י <WH3045> and my familiar friends שְׁכֵחֽוּנִי׃ <WH7911> have forgotten

גָּ֘רֵ֤י <WH1481> They that dwell בֵיתִ֣י <WH1004> in mine house וְ֭אַמְהֹתַי <WH519> and my maids לְזָ֣ר <WH2114> me for a stranger תַּחְשְׁבֻ֑נִי <WH2803> count נָ֝כְרִ֗י <WH5237> I am an alien הָיִ֥יתִי <WH1961> I am בְעֵינֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH5869> in their sight

לְעַבְדִּ֣י <WH5650> my servant קָ֭רָאתִי <WH7121> I called וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> does not יַעֲנֶ֑ה <WH6030> and he gave [me] no answer בְּמוֹ־ <WH1119> him with פִ֝֗י <WH6310> my mouth אֶתְחַנֶּן־ <WH2603> I intreated לֽוֹ׃

ר֭וּחִֽי <WH7307> My breath זָ֣רָה <WH2114> is strange לְאִשְׁתִּ֑י <WH802> to my wife וְ֝חַנֹּתִ֗י <WH2603> am loathsome לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> for the children's בִטְנִֽי׃ <WH990> [sake] of mine own body
גַּם־ <WH1571> Even עֲ֭וִילִים <WH5759> Yea young children מָ֣אֲסוּ <WH3988> despised בִ֑י אָ֝ק֗וּמָה <WH6965> me I arose וַיְדַבְּרוּ־ <WH1696> and they spake בִֽי׃

תִּֽ֭עֲבוּנִי <WH8581> abhorred כָּל־ <WH3605> All מְתֵ֣י <WH4962> friends סוֹדִ֑י <WH5475> All my inward וְזֶֽה־ <WH2088> and those אָ֝הַ֗בְתִּי <WH157> me and they whom I loved נֶהְפְּכוּ־ <WH2015> are turned בִֽי׃

בְּעוֹרִ֣י <WH5785> to my skin וּ֭בִבְשָׂרִי <WH1320> and to my flesh דָּבְקָ֣ה <WH1692> cleaveth עַצְמִ֑י <WH6106> My bone וָ֝אֶתְמַלְּטָ֗ה <WH4422> and I am escaped בְּע֣וֹר <WH5785> with the skin שִׁנָּֽי׃ <WH8127> of my teeth

חָנֻּ֬נִי <WH2603> Have pity חָנֻּ֣נִי <WH2603> upon me have pity אַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> you רֵעָ֑י <WH7453> upon me O ye my friends כִּ֥י <WH3588> For יַד־ <WH3027> for the hand אֱ֝ל֗וֹהַּ <WH433> of God נָ֣גְעָה <WH5060> hath touched בִּֽי׃
לָ֭מָּה <WH4100> Why תִּרְדְּפֻ֣נִי <WH7291> Why do ye persecute כְמוֹ־ <WH3644> as אֵ֑ל <WH410> me as God וּ֝מִבְּשָׂרִ֗י <WH1320> body לֹ֣א <WH3808> not תִשְׂבָּֽעוּ׃ <WH7646> and are not satisfied

מִֽי־ <WH4310> Oh יִתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> Oh that אֵ֭פוֹ <WH645> were now וְיִכָּתְב֣וּן <WH3789> written מִלָּ֑י <WH4405> my words מִֽי־ <WH4310> oh יִתֵּ֖ן <WH5414> oh that בַּסֵּ֣פֶר <WH5612> in a book וְיֻחָֽקוּ׃ <WH2710> they were printed
בְּעֵט־ <WH5842> pen בַּרְזֶ֥ל <WH1270> with an iron וְעֹפָ֑רֶת <WH5777> and lead לָ֝עַ֗ד <WH5703> for ever בַּצּ֥וּר <WH6697> in the rock יֵחָצְבֽוּן׃ <WH2672> That they were graven

וַאֲנִ֣י <WH589> I יָ֭דַעְתִּי <WH3045> For I know גֹּ֣אֲלִי <WH1350> [that] my redeemer חָ֑י <WH2416> liveth וְ֝אַחֲר֗וֹן <WH314> at the latter עַל־ <WH5921> on עָפָ֥ר <WH6083> [day] upon the earth יָקֽוּם׃ <WH6965> and [that] he shall stand

וְאַחַ֣ר <WH310> And [though] after ע֭וֹרִֽי <WH5785> my skin נִקְּפוּ־ <WH5362> [worms] destroy זֹ֑את <WH2063> from וּ֝מִבְּשָׂרִ֗י <WH1320> this [body] yet in my flesh אֶֽחֱזֶ֥ה <WH2372> shall I see אֱלֽוֹהַּ׃ <WH433> God

אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> Whom אֲנִ֨י ׀ <WH589> myself אֶֽחֱזֶה־ <WH2372> Whom I shall see לִּ֗י וְעֵינַ֣י <WH5869> for myself and mine eyes רָא֣וּ <WH7200> shall behold וְלֹא־ <WH3808> and not זָ֑ר <WH2114> and not another כָּל֖וּ <WH3615> be consumed כִלְיֹתַ֣י <WH3629> [though] my reins בְּחֵקִֽי׃ <WH2436> within

כִּ֣י <WH3588> If תֹ֭אמְרוּ <WH559> But ye should say מַה־ <WH4100> How נִּרְדָּף־ <WH7291> Why persecute ל֑וֹ וְשֹׁ֥רֶשׁ <WH8328> we him seeing the root דָּ֝בָ֗ר <WH1697> of the matter נִמְצָא־ <WH4672> is found בִֽי׃

גּ֤וּרוּ <WH1481> Be ye afraid לָכֶ֨ם ׀ מִפְּנֵי־ <WH6440> of חֶ֗רֶב <WH2719> of the sword כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For חֵ֭מָה <WH2534> for wrath עֲוֹנ֣וֹת <WH5771> [bringeth] the punishments חָ֑רֶב <WH2719> the sword לְמַ֖עַן <WH4616> So תֵּדְע֣וּן <WH3045> that ye may know [שַׁדִּין כ] (שַׁדּֽוּן׃ <WH1779> cause ק) ס
